title: Bug 130068 - Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with parameter.
description:
Description: Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with parameter.
Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report parameter without a default value.
2. Drag the parameter to the Layout.
3. Preview the report.
OB: When previewing a report that contains a parameter, the Report Parameter window does not appear.
EB: The Report Parameter window should pop up when previewing a report that contains a parameter.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter without a default value.
2. Drag the parameter to the Layout.
3. Preview the report.
